getProtocol().Description: Gets the protocol used to connect to the server.

Returns: the port number of the SIP server
getPort().Description: Gets the port number of the SIP server.

Returns: the display name of the user
getDisplayName().Description: Gets the display name of the user.

Returns: the SIP URI string of this profile
getUriString().Description: Gets the SIP URI string of this profile.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

Returns: the network address of the server outbound proxy
getProxyAddress().Description: Gets the network address of the server outbound proxy.

Returns: the flag of registering the profile automatically.

getProfileName().Description: Gets the (user-defined) name of the profile.

getAuthUserName().Description: Gets the username for authentication. If it is null, then the username is used in authentication instead.

Returns: the flag of sending SIP keep-alive messages.

ClassDesc: Defines a SIP profile, including a SIP account, domain and server information. You can create a @B_android#net#sip#SipProfile_E@ using @B_android#net#sip#SipProfile#Builder_E@. You can also retrieve one from a @B_android#net#sip#SipSession_E@, using @B_android#net#sip#SipSession#getLocalProfile_E@ and @B_android#net#sip#SipSession#getPeerProfile_E@.
